title: Law Office
desc:
Post 27
Rent: $500

Stop-In Effects:
- Choose any player to Sue. Spend up to 1000$ in your lawsuit. Flip a coin: heads, player wins the lawsuit and steals money from the defendant equal to 1/2 rounded down of what they spent on the lawsuit. Tails, lose all money spent on lawsuit.

Attributes:
- Whenever a player goes bankrupt, owner gains 500$.
